record.text: We booked the Marmalade hotel for a fixed rate for 3 nights at a total of $249.78. When we checked out, the cost of the room with taxes was $382.48,which is $132.70 more than the rate wheretosleep.com told us we were getting. So, upon our return, I attempted to get the credit for the $132.70 since they have a guarantee on this, so I thought. I was told by the customer care representative that the hotel should have never given us that bill because they agreed to a wheretosleep.com corporate rate. So, I got stuck with $132.70 that I should not owe.
